title: Psychology Survey Help
selftext: My friend is doing a psychology survey on the mentality of indian people in accordance to same sex marriage. It'll be of great help if you can fill up the google form [here.](https://forms.gle/EpRCKCrCzoz4VQoaA)  It'll take only 2 minutes so please share your opinion. Thankyou!
comments:
Even after working in market research for 6 years, I still don't understand the point of 5 point scales. Also changing levels of action like the would/do questions are going to generate bad data.

That being said I filled this out except the last three questions because they are too loaded to be dropped on someone as they are.
